title: Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses, Android TV Smart Glasses with 360" Micro-OLED Display, Google Play, Media Streaming, HDCP Support & Cloud Gaming, Console, Android, iOS, Windows Compatible
descriptions:
Introducing the Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses - your ultimate gateway to immersive entertainment! These lightweight (75g) smart glasses boast a stunning 360" Micro-OLED display, ensuring a crystal-clear viewing experience. Compatible with Android, iOS, and Windows platforms, these glasses bring your favorite content right before your eyes.

Enjoy the latest Android TV 12 experience with access to Google Play, opening up a world of apps and games. Stream your favorite shows and movies from popular platforms like Hulu, Disney+, and Peacock. With HDCP support, you can trust that your content is secure and protected.

But that's not all - these glasses also support cloud gaming, turning your world into a personal gaming hub. Dive into console-quality games without the need for a console.

Your comfort is our priority. The Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses are T端V Rheinland certified for eye comfort, and offer a diopter adjustment range from 0.00D to -6.00D.

Stay connected with multiple connectivity options, including USB-C, HDMI adapter, and wireless adapter. Experience the future of entertainment with the Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses - your passport to a world of endless possibilities!
